<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Migrate cached users</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var MIGRATE_CACHED_USERS_JOB = '75e109c648a10110fa9b69c85546a139';

var jobGr = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
if (jobGr.get(MIGRATE_CACHED_USERS_JOB)) {
    gs.executeNow(jobGr);
} else {
    gs.error("Fix script unable to find 'Migrate cached users' job");
}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-02-08 19:57:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>634040b919a50110fa9b2a5ab6b9ee5d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Migrate cached users</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_634040b919a50110fa9b2a5ab6b9ee5d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 00:02:08</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
